resources.string: Field and method binding for Android views which uses annotation processing to generate boilerplate code for you.
This is a logger with a small, extensible API which provides utility on top of Android\'s normal Log class.
A memory leak detection library for Android and Java.
A fast dependency injector for Android and Java.
Stetho is a sophisticated debug bridge for Android applications. When enabled, developers have access to the Chrome Developer Tools feature natively part of the Chrome desktop browser.
Mocking framework for unit tests written in Java.
PowerMock is a Java framework that allows you to unit test code normally regarded as untestable.
A set of AssertJ assertions geared toward testing Android.
AssertJ provides a rich and intuitive set of strongly-typed assertions to use for unit testing (either with JUnit or TestNG).
Robolectric is a testing framework that de-fangs the Android SDK so you can test-drive the development of your Android app.
